About Me

I'm a Passionate developer from the beautiful Northwest!

BIO

Technology is something I've always been passionate about. Correctly engineered systems can influence lives in a profound way. The ability to empower people and impact lives positively is what gets me excited about building great products. Utilizing best practices while building the interactivity needed for clients to reach their goals is the focus of every project.
